name: InfiniteBow
description:
Hey, Warrior, How far can you go and be the next Master of the village?!

Slide anywhere on screen, aim and shoot the TARGET. Be focused, you need to aim the center if you want to be the next master of village FASTER...

Gather FEATHERs and unlock new Arrows, Bows, Arrow Holders and worlds and enjoy your journey in a interesting way.

Key features:
- Awesome graphics and effects
- Hundred of levels to unlock
- Over 35 skins
- Nice gameplay and simple mechanics
